```{r}
hiroshima <- read.table("R10CANCR.DAT",skip = 1, header = T)
write.csv(hiroshima, "hiroshima.csv", row.names = F)
```

```{r}
fstr <- c("2I3","I4","F7.1","I5","I4","F10.2","26I4")
hiroshima <- read.fortran("r10cancrfix.dat",fstr)

hiroshima

```
